item.title: By: Manfred Karrer
item.dc:creator: Manfred Karrer
item.description:
Hi Sergi, thanks for the links! I know Bitmarkets and I am in contact with the devs and discussed their solution. In fact I used the same concept initially for Bitsquare but move to the current concept because a 2of2 MultiSig-only solution carries some risks regarding blackmail attacks. But anyway a great project!
Good to hear that CLTV is finally getting in! Great to see that Aaron van Wirdum is covering it!
item.content:encoded:
Hi Sergi,

item.title: By: Sergi Pcm
item.dc:creator: Sergi Pcm
item.description:
Hello Manfred, insteresting article, as always!
Was reading an excellent article about Bitmarket (similar to openbazaar) and they discuss advantatges and disadvantatges of both escrow / reputation / security deposit; very professional approach, worth a read, its an easy to read, short whitepaper: https://voluntary.net/bitmarkets/whitepaper/
On the other side I just saw that CheckLockTimeVerify will be implemented in Bitcoin by the start-mid 2016, there's an excellent article explaining exactly what does it means this implementation, and it looks like it offers great possibilites https://bitcoinmagazine.com/articles/checklocktimeverify-or-how-a-time-lock-patch-will-boost-bitcoin-s-potential-1446658530
keep the good work regards,
sergi
